body_html:
You're probably running into an uninitialized bazel-tensorflow directory. This is due to a recent change meant to automatically fetch the app assets for you.

If you run:
bazel build -c opt tensorflow/examples/android:tensorflow_demo
one time it should create the necessary directories for you. After that you can build from inside Android Studio.
body_text:
You're probably running into an uninitialized bazel-tensorflow directory. This is due to a recent change meant to automatically fetch the app assets for you.
If you run:
bazel build -c opt tensorflow/examples/android:tensorflow_demo
one time it should create the necessary directories for you. After that you can build from inside Android Studio.
body:
You're probably running into an uninitialized bazel-tensorflow directory. This is due to a recent change meant to automatically fetch the app assets for you.

If you run:
`bazel build -c opt tensorflow/examples/android:tensorflow_demo`
one time it should create the necessary directories for you. After that you can build from inside Android Studio.
